name: Alter Ego (itch) (migouche)
description:
In this game you will have to make your way through the platform while avoiding ghosts attacks. You have an alter ego only able to jump and another only able to shoot, so you have to switch between them to progress through the game.

Art and music made by https://linktr.ee/GamesJO.

PS: Don't have time to make WebGL work. But it will be done.
